name: Super Knight Quest (Alpha)
description:
Support SKQ on Greenlight!

Community Discord

Online Flash Version

Super Knight Quest is a roguelike sidescroller starring a knight on a bold quest. Each run is different, and you'll need to master your trust sword as well as a whole host of upgrades if you want to make it to the end.

This is the alpha of the first world of six. There's two acts and a boss, as well as a highscore system. Got what it takes to get fast? Jump on the speedrunning/community discord and talk about the game and share highscores :D

Unfortunately the executable is available in windows only, but a Mac and Linux version will be released soon. If you're running Mac/Linux, try the online version (be sure to enable Flash.)
